libcfs/include/libcfs/libcfs_ioctl.h

00033  * This file is part of Lustre, http://www.lustre.org/
00034  * Lustre is a trademark of Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00035  *
00036  * libcfs/include/libcfs/libcfs_ioctl.h
00037  *
00038  * Low-level ioctl data structures. Kernel ioctl functions declared here,
00039  * and user space functions are in libcfs/util/ioctl.h.
00040  *
00041  */
00042 
00043 #ifndef __LIBCFS_IOCTL_H__
00044 #define __LIBCFS_IOCTL_H__
00045 
00046 #include <linux/types.h>
00047 #include <linux/ioctl.h>
00048 
00049 #define LIBCFS_IOCTL_VERSION 0x0001000a
00050 #define LIBCFS_IOCTL_VERSION2 0x0001000b
00051 
00052 struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr {
00053         __u32 ioc_len;
00054         __u32 ioc_version;
00055 };
00056 
00058 #define LIBCFS_IOC_DATA_MAX     (128 * 1024)
00059 
00060 struct libcfs_ioctl_data {
00061         struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr ioc_hdr;
00062 
00063         __u64 ioc_nid;
00064         __u64 ioc_u64[1];
00065 
00066         __u32 ioc_flags;
00067         __u32 ioc_count;
00068         __u32 ioc_net;
00069         __u32 ioc_u32[7];
00070 
00071         __u32 ioc_inllen1;
00072         char *ioc_inlbuf1;
00073         __u32 ioc_inllen2;
00074         char *ioc_inlbuf2;
00075 
00076         __u32 ioc_plen1; /* buffers in userspace */
00077         char __user *ioc_pbuf1;
00078         __u32 ioc_plen2; /* buffers in userspace */
00079         char __user *ioc_pbuf2;
00080 
00081         char ioc_bulk[0];
00082 };
00083 
00084 struct libcfs_debug_ioctl_data
00085 {
00086         struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr hdr;
00087         unsigned int subs;
00088         unsigned int debug;
00089 };
00090 
00091 /* 'f' ioctls are defined in lustre_ioctl.h and lustre_user.h except for: */
00092 #define LIBCFS_IOC_DEBUG_MASK             _IOWR('f', 250, long)
00093 #define IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE                 long
00094 
00095 #define IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE                               ('e')
00096 #define IOC_LIBCFS_MIN_NR                             30
00097 /* libcfs ioctls */
00098 /* IOC_LIBCFS_PANIC obsolete in 2.8.0, was _IOWR('e', 30, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE) */
00099 #define IOC_LIBCFS_CLEAR_DEBUG             _IOWR('e', 31, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00100 #define IOC_LIBCFS_MARK_DEBUG              _IOWR('e', 32, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00101 /* IOC_LIBCFS_MEMHOG obsolete in 2.8.0, was _IOWR('e', 36, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE) */
00102 /* lnet ioctls */
00103 #define IOC_LIBCFS_GET_NI                  _IOWR('e', 50, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00104 #define IOC_LIBCFS_FAIL_NID                _IOWR('e', 51, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00105 #define IOC_LIBCFS_NOTIFY_ROUTER           _IOWR('e', 55, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00106 #define IOC_LIBCFS_UNCONFIGURE             _IOWR('e', 56, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00107 /*       IOC_LIBCFS_PORTALS_COMPATIBILITY  _IOWR('e', 57, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE) */
00108 #define IOC_LIBCFS_LNET_DIST               _IOWR('e', 58, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00109 #define IOC_LIBCFS_CONFIGURE               _IOWR('e', 59, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00110 #define IOC_LIBCFS_TESTPROTOCOMPAT         _IOWR('e', 60, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00111 #define IOC_LIBCFS_PING                    _IOWR('e', 61, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00112 /*      IOC_LIBCFS_DEBUG_PEER              _IOWR('e', 62, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE) */
00113 #define IOC_LIBCFS_LNETST                  _IOWR('e', 63, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00114 #define IOC_LIBCFS_LNET_FAULT              _IOWR('e', 64, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00115 /* lnd ioctls */
00116 #define IOC_LIBCFS_REGISTER_MYNID          _IOWR('e', 70, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00117 #define IOC_LIBCFS_CLOSE_CONNECTION        _IOWR('e', 71, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00118 #define IOC_LIBCFS_PUSH_CONNECTION         _IOWR('e', 72, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00119 #define IOC_LIBCFS_GET_CONN                _IOWR('e', 73, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00120 #define IOC_LIBCFS_DEL_PEER                _IOWR('e', 74, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00121 #define IOC_LIBCFS_ADD_PEER                _IOWR('e', 75, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00122 #define IOC_LIBCFS_GET_PEER                _IOWR('e', 76, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00123 /* ioctl 77 is free for use */
00124 #define IOC_LIBCFS_ADD_INTERFACE           _IOWR('e', 78, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00125 #define IOC_LIBCFS_DEL_INTERFACE           _IOWR('e', 79, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00126 #define IOC_LIBCFS_GET_INTERFACE           _IOWR('e', 80, IOCTL_LIBCFS_TYPE)
00127 
00128 
00129 /*
00130  * DLC Specific IOCTL numbers.
00131  * In order to maintain backward compatibility with any possible external
00132  * tools which might be accessing the IOCTL numbers, a new group of IOCTL
00133  * number have been allocated.
00134  */
00135 #define IOCTL_CONFIG_SIZE               struct lnet_ioctl_config_data
00136 #define IOC_LIBCFS_ADD_ROUTE            _IOWR(IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE, 81, IOCTL_CONFIG_SIZE)
00137 #define IOC_LIBCFS_DEL_ROUTE            _IOWR(IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE, 82, IOCTL_CONFIG_SIZE)
00138 #define IOC_LIBCFS_GET_ROUTE            _IOWR(IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE, 83, IOCTL_CONFIG_SIZE)
00139 #define IOC_LIBCFS_ADD_NET              _IOWR(IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE, 84, IOCTL_CONFIG_SIZE)
00140 #define IOC_LIBCFS_DEL_NET              _IOWR(IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE, 85, IOCTL_CONFIG_SIZE)
00141 #define IOC_LIBCFS_GET_NET              _IOWR(IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE, 86, IOCTL_CONFIG_SIZE)
00142 #define IOC_LIBCFS_CONFIG_RTR           _IOWR(IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE, 87, IOCTL_CONFIG_SIZE)
00143 #define IOC_LIBCFS_ADD_BUF              _IOWR(IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE, 88, IOCTL_CONFIG_SIZE)
00144 #define IOC_LIBCFS_GET_BUF              _IOWR(IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE, 89, IOCTL_CONFIG_SIZE)
00145 #define IOC_LIBCFS_GET_PEER_INFO        _IOWR(IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE, 90, IOCTL_CONFIG_SIZE)
00146 #define IOC_LIBCFS_GET_LNET_STATS       _IOWR(IOC_LIBCFS_TYPE, 91, IOCTL_CONFIG_SIZE)
00147 #define IOC_LIBCFS_MAX_NR               91
00148 
00149 #endif /* __LIBCFS_IOCTL_H__ */
